Text:
This is my release (Discovery.Channel.Mile.Wide.Tornado.Oklahoma.Disaster.WS.TVRip.x264-UNPOPULAR) but muxed into a MKV container and tagged as HDTV.

Fucker.

A private site. From there it gets spread to a few release blogs and forums.

I don't care you took it but wth is the point of tagging it as HDTV and remuxing lol

Sorry if this is way offtopic. First of all, than you very much MrUnpopular for your release of the Oklahoma documentary, I'm a fan of Tim Samaras research in the field of severe weather and this documentary was dedicated to him. I hope  you read this because if you don't mind, i'd like to make a request to you: can you please release the "Mile Wide Tornado: Stormchasers Tribute" because Discovery is not airing it in my country, and i would very much like to watch it. Thanks in advance for your time.

When i was fixing audio sync issues it got converted into mkv see my comment here https://forum.suprbay.org/showthread.php?tid=125073&page=320 also changed name to HDTV instead of TVRip as i havent seen any other torrents labeled TVRip. Didnt realize you were the original source, it wasnt uploaded to the TPB so thats why I uploaded it. Heres where i found it http://releasethread.ws/?s=Discovery.Channel.Mile.Wide.Tornado.Oklahoma.Disaster . If anybody owns it its the Discovery Channel ;)
The audio was oos? Seems fine to me on my original encode of it

@MrUnpopular
Thank you very much for the Tribute release, I googled it yesterday, trust me, went over the first 10 pages in Google search and still couldn't find it, so I gave up hope. My respect to you and your great contributions  :)
It's possible you searched it before it got uploaded.
